string_table.str: Digging in!
You destroyed our carrier, demons! I shall see your remains scattered to the winds!
I, Val'Saham, will return to my clan with your heads.
This is for my fallen brothers!
Blisterbacks! That'll show the big bullies!
The Banished have a Scarab nearby, but it's out of commision for now.
It must have been damaged trying to escape the carrier Isabel destroyed.
We don't have time to try and blast our way through, every second we wait, the Banished are moving more troops onto the ring through that access point.
Use that Scarab to break the barricade so we can stop the Banished reaching that access point!
Use that Scarab to break the barrier so our troops can reach the Banished base, Douglas.
I know just the people for the job. Alice, Douglas? Fight your way through and capture that Scarab.
We've got to reach the Foundry and stop the Banished boarding the ring.
T
Spirit of Fire Actual, I can't find a single breach in the Banished's barricade.
I
M
Got it. Douglas, let's make a mess of them.
Now, this is more like it!
I've got a signal incoming on the Scarab's comms.
Seriously! With the talking...Now, let's go smash something.
It'll be a pleasure.
The Banished have blocked all routes to that access point. We'll have to find a way to break through.
We need you on the installation. We may have stopped the Banished flow of reinforcements, but Atriox already has a sizeable force on the ring.
Use the access point to get yourselves to the ring and set a charge to destroy it behind you. Jerome is already en route, report to him when you arrive.
Good work Spartan. Now push forward and take out that Banished base
Take that base down, we're going to need every edge to push forward.
Get a base ready, you're going to need additional troops to support that Scarab.
G
It's vital you destroy those bases, team. If we don't stop the Banished reinforcing that Halo, our troops there will have no chance to hold it.
We've lost the Scarab, abort mission! We need another plan.
We're too late, team. We can't beat the Banished forces now.
I'm dropping in some ODSTs to support you.
Douglas, that Scarab is still vulnerable to air and anti-vehicle units. Make sure you have a support force to respond quickly to attacks. We cannot afford to lose it.
Alice, protect that Scarab until it's destroyed the barricades and cleared a path through for our troops.
I
Impressive work, Spartan!
Support's on it's way, hang on.
You shall not take our Scarab, demons! Shipmaster, I have the human's location!
You did it! They won't be able to send any more of their troops!
The Banished have established bases at the edge of the Foundry. They're sending troops up to the Halo using the nearby access point.
K
Another facility down!
That's all the Banished's facilities down, great work!
Watch out! You've got incoming!
Better hurry up, they're moving more troops to that Scarab. I think it's nearly repaired.
Spartans, the Banished have an Honor Guard overseeing the repair of the Scarab.
I
And by my estimation, we don't have long.
We've got to destroy that base before it's too late!
Hurry! Every minute we lose, we're losing ground to the Banished!
The Banished are still loading troops onto the Halo! We're running out of time!
We haven't much time left, Spartans!
If we don't destroy that base soon, we won't be able to stop the Banished!
Hold them back! Spirit of Fire, we need back up! We can't hold out much longer!
Thanks, Spartans. We haven't been able to make much headway since we've been here!
This I gotta see. You've got our guns.
Douglas - let's clean house.
Banshees! Keep them away from the Scarab!
Move in, troops!
Douglas, destroy that barrier! We don't all have a Scarab, remember!
Then let's make sure we win.
We'll deal with the gatecrashers, sir.
The Honor Guard is out of the picture! Douglas, you're up!
We've got another Blisterback nearby!
Taking heavy fire. Take out that Blisterback!
Douglas, there's only one more barricade between us and the access point. Find the safest route, I've got your back.
Too bad! Just line 'em up and knock 'em down!
O
A
W
We've got a welcome party waiting for us!
I enjoyed that, sir. What are our next orders?
Yes, sir. It'll be good to get the whole team back together again.
Well, it was fun while it lasted.
I hear that.
Another base down, lets push onto the Halo Forge
Banished base detected, dead ahead.
B
Barricade's down, Alice. Send them in!
I've opened up another route, we are good to go!
Barricade destroyed and path clear!
They've got Blisterbacks guarding the valley. They'll bombard us all the way to the Scarab if we don't take them out now.
Sounds like this is the big one, partner.
Spirit of Fire Actual, the barricade is cleared. We've got a path to the Foundry now, sir.
Blisterbacks on the way!
Watch out, we've got Blisterbacks!
Heads up, Blisterbacks!
Watch it, Blisterbacks incoming!
Blisterbacks deploying, watch out!
They're deploying Blisterbacks!
The Banished are digging in with Blisterbacks!
Blisterback artillery deploying!
Banshees!
Watch out, Douglas! Banshees!
I've got Banshees!
They're sending in Banshees!
Artillery deploying, take out those Blisterbacks fast!
More Blisterbacks inbound!
I think 'safe' is a relative term, partner.
Copy that, sir.
They really don't want us getting to that Scarab!
Alice, we have to get you one of these too!
Sorry, one side, coming through.
Think I just stepped in something.
This sure beats a Warthog!
You know, Alice, I've always wanted to drive one of those things...
Excellent. It's been a while since I tussled with an Honor Guard.
Put us down here, pilot!
We're here to change that.
Wraiths? No problem!
Establish a base
Establish a base so you can recruit and army to reach the Halo's access point.
Cripple Banished production facilities
Cripple the Banished facilities to slow their production of units.
Production facility crippled
Breach the defenses with the Scarab
Use the Scarab's firepower and maneuverability to destroy the barricades.
Destroy the Banished base to stop them reinforcing the Halo
Protect the Scarab
Keep the Scarab functioning as it clears a path through the barricades
Keep the Scarab functioning as it clears a path through the barricades
Capture the damaged Scarab
Capture the damaged Scarab so you can use it to destroy the barriers blocking the path to the Halo's access point.
Repel the Banished attack
Drive off the remaining Banished
Use the Scarab to break through the amber barricades.
Blisterbacks can be deployed to become a siege vehicle and fire a barrage of annihilator missiles. Use @special_power@ to toggle between ground and air states.
The Scarab is the Banished's super unit. Super units are the most powerful units on the battlefield
The Elite Honour Guard is lethal at close range - keep your distance commander.
This unit was damaged on impact with the Ark, severly limiting its anti-air capabilities. Despite this the Scarab remains a force to be reckoned with
Your Scarab has taken damage. Use your units or leader powers to repair it
Scorpion Canister Shell upgrade is now available from the Garage.
Spartans can also use the Spartan Slam to hijack vehicles. Move the crosshair over a vehicle and press the @special_power@ to hijack it.
Wipe out the enemy before the Halo is overwhelmed by Banished reinforcements.
Prevent damage to the Scarab
Don't let the captured Scarab drop below 25% health.
Destroy Banshees with Infantry or Wolverines
Banshees destroyed
Infantry and Wolverines are effective anti-air units. Use them to blow Banshees out of the sky.
Destroy Blisterbacks
Blisterbacks destroyed
Blisterbacks are artillery units that can convert to air units.
Destroy base structures with the Scarab
Base structures destroyed with the scarab
Make the most of your time with the Scarab by killing Banished buildings with it.
Kill squads with the Scarab
Squads killed with the Scarab
Make the most of your time with the Scarab by killing Banished squads with it.
Scarab Commander
Scarab Health
Stop the Banished Reinforcements
Eliminate the Scarab Commander and his support
Kill the Commander to prevent the Scarab from being repaired.
Destroy all Banished barricades
Destroy all Banished barricades
Amber barricade destroyed
Destroy the Banished fortress in under twenty minutes
Destroy the Banished fortress in under twenty minutes
There are several barricades blocking the path to the access point. Destroy them all.
